pkgmetadata.longdescription: Godot is a fully featured, open source, MIT licensed, game engine. It focuses on having great tools, and a visual oriented workflow that can export to PC, Mobile and Web platforms with no hassle. The editor, language and APIs are feature rich, yet simple to learn, allowing you to become productive in a matter of hours.

use.flag: Build game engines tools and game editor
Enable support for the dev-lang/squirrel scripting language
Enable support for the Remote Filesystem Driver
Enable support for the minizip library
Enable support for the webp image format
Enable support for the DDS Texture loader
Enable support for the PVR (PowerVR) Texture loader
Enable support for DXT1, DXT3 and DXT5 formats using libsquish
Enable support for the 3D API. Disable it if you are going to use only the 2D API
Enable support for the Opus Audio Format
